properties.description:
Author: Rizaul Kamal
Date: 16/05/2023
Description: Extracts Adviser Frim data from DPDB

source.oracleReaderQuery:
with PARTY_DETAILS
as
(select P.ORGANISATION_NAME,
        PR.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        PR.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
        OPR.STATUS,
        OPR.FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
        OPR.REGULATORY_STATUS_ID,
        OPR.REGULATION_TYPE_ID
   from DPARTNER.PARTY P
  inner join DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE PR
     on (PR.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID)
  inner join DPARTNER.ORGANISATION_PARTY_ROLE OPR
     on (OPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID = PR.PARTY_ROLE_ID)
  where PR.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID in ('adv_firm', 'par_org', 'os_firm', 'sp_firm')
    and PR.PARTY_ROLE_ID in
          (select distinct
                  PRR.PARTY_ROLE_ID 
             from DPARTNER.COMMISSION_ACCOUNT CA
            inner join DPARTNER.LEGACY_ACCOUNT_DETAIL LAD
               on (CA.COMMISSION_ACCOUNT_ID = LAD.COMMISSION_ACCOUNT_ID)
            inner join DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE_RELATIONSHIP PRR
               on (PRR.RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID = CA.PARTY_ROLE_ID)
            where relationship_type_id = 'rel_afoff'
          )
),
HEAD_OFFICE
as
(select PRR.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        PRR.RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID as HEAD_OFFICE_PARTY_ROLE_ID
   from DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE_RELATIONSHIP PRR
  inner join DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE PR
     on (PRR.RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID = PR.PARTY_ROLE_ID)
  where PRR.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_ID = 'rel_afoff'
    and PRR.END_DATE is null
    and PR.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID = 'head_off'
),
HO_ADDRESS
as
(select ADDRESS.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE_1,
        ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE_2,
        ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE_3,
        ADDRESS.ADDRESS_LINE_4,
        ADDRESS.POSTCODE
   from (select CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
                trim(PA.ADDRESS_LINE_1) as ADDRESS_LINE_1,
                trim(PA.ADDRESS_LINE_2) as ADDRESS_LINE_2,
                trim(PA.ADDRESS_LINE_3) as ADDRESS_LINE_3,
                trim(PA.ADDRESS_LINE_4) as ADDRESS_LINE_4,
                trim(PA.POSTCODE) as POSTCODE,
                row_number() over (partition by CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                       order by CPR.UPDATED_DATE desc) RN
           from DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE PR
          inner join DPARTNER.CONTACT_POINT_ROLE CPR
             on (PR.PARTY_ROLE_ID = CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID)  
          inner join DPARTNER.CONTACT_POINT CP
             on (CP.CONTACT_POINT_ID = CPR.CONTACT_POINT_ID)
          inner join DPARTNER.POSTAL_ADDRESS PA
             on (PA.CONTACT_POINT_ID  = CP.CONTACT_POINT_ID)
          where CPR.END_DATE is null
            and CP.CONTACT_POINT_TYPE_ID = 'cp_addr'
            and nvl(CPR.CONTACT_POINT_ROLE_TYPE_ID, 'A') != 'cpr_rig'
            and PR.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID = 'head_off') ADDRESS
  where ADDRESS.RN = 1
),
PARTY_ROLE_NETWORK
as
(select nvl(STAGE2.PARTY_ROLE_ID, PRR.PARTY_ROLE_ID) as PARTY_ROLE_ID,
       PRR.RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID
  from DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE_RELATIONSHIP PRR
  left outer join (select PARTY_ROLE_ID,
                          RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID
                     from DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE_RELATIONSHIP
                    where RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_ID = 'rel_netmem'
                      and END_DATE IS NULL
                      and DEFAULT_REPORT_RELATIONSHIP = 'Y'
                      and RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID in
                           (select PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                   from DPARTNER.ORGANISATION_PARTY_ROLE
                                   where REGULATION_TYPE_ID = 'rt_apprep'
                                     and status = 'A'
                           )
                  ) STAGE2
    on (STAGE2.RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID = PRR.PARTY_ROLE_ID)
  where PRR.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_ID = 'rel_netmem'
    and PRR.END_DATE IS NULL
    and PRR.DEFAULT_REPORT_RELATIONSHIP = 'Y'
    and PRR.RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID in
          (select PARTY_ROLE_ID
             from DPARTNER.ORGANISATION_PARTY_ROLE
            where REGULATION_TYPE_ID = 'rt_apprep'
              and status = 'A'
          )
),
AUTHORISATION
as
(select PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        PROD_GRP_ID 
   from DPARTNER.PRODUCT_AUTHORISATION
  where END_DATE is null 
    and PROD_GRP_ID in (10002, 10003, 10004)
),
ROLE_PERMISSION
as
(select PERMISSION_TYPE_ID,
        PARTY_ROLE_ID 
   from DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE_PERMISSIONS
  where END_DATE is null
    and PERMISSION_TYPE_ID = 'prp_penstrans'
),
HO_EMAIL
as
(select EMAIL.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        EMAIL.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS
   from (select CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
                trim(EUA.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS) as EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
                row_number() over (partition by CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                       order by CPR.UPDATED_DATE desc) RN
           from DPARTNER.CONTACT_POINT_ROLE CPR
          inner join DPARTNER.CONTACT_POINT CP
             on (CP.CONTACT_POINT_ID = CPR.CONTACT_POINT_ID)
          inner join DPARTNER.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS EUA
             on (EUA.CONTACT_POINT_ID = CP.CONTACT_POINT_ID)
          inner join DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE PR
             on (PR.PARTY_ROLE_ID = CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID )
          where CPR.END_DATE is null
            and CP.CONTACT_POINT_TYPE_ID = 'cp_email'
            and PR.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID = 'head_off') EMAIL
  where EMAIL.RN = 1
),
HO_PHONE
as
(select PHONE.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        PHONE.PHONE_FAX_NUMBER
   from (select CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
                PFN.PHONE_FAX_NUMBER,
                row_number() over (partition by CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                       order by CPR.UPDATED_DATE desc) RN
           from DPARTNER.CONTACT_POINT_ROLE CPR
          inner join DPARTNER.CONTACT_POINT CP
             on (CP.CONTACT_POINT_ID = CPR.CONTACT_POINT_ID)
          inner join DPARTNER.PHONE_FAX_NUMBER PFN
             on (PFN.CONTACT_POINT_ID = CP.CONTACT_POINT_ID)
          inner join DPARTNER.PARTY_ROLE PR
             on (PR.PARTY_ROLE_ID = CPR.PARTY_ROLE_ID )
          where CPR.END_DATE is null
            and CP.CONTACT_POINT_TYPE_ID = 'cp_phone'
            and PR.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID = 'head_off') PHONE
  where PHONE.RN = 1
)
select PD.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
       PD.ORGANISATION_NAME, 
       PD.FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
       PD.STATUS, 
       PD.REGULATORY_STATUS_ID, 
	   PD.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
       nvl2(AIA.PROD_GRP_ID, 1, 0) as PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE,
       nvl2(AMA.PROD_GRP_ID, 1, 0) as PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE,
       nvl2(APA.PROD_GRP_ID, 1, 0) as PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE,
       nvl2(RP.PERMISSION_TYPE_ID, 1, 0) as PERM_PENSION_ADVICE,
	   HA.ADDRESS_LINE_1,
       HA.ADDRESS_LINE_2,
       HA.ADDRESS_LINE_3,
       HA.ADDRESS_LINE_4,
       HA.POSTCODE,
	   HE.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
       HP.PHONE_FAX_NUMBER
  from PARTY_DETAILS PD
  left outer join HEAD_OFFICE HO
    on (PD.PARTY_ROLE_ID = HO.PARTY_ROLE_ID)
  left outer join HO_ADDRESS HA
    on HA.PARTY_ROLE_ID = HO.HEAD_OFFICE_PARTY_ROLE_ID
  left outer join PARTY_ROLE_NETWORK PRN
    on (PRN.RELATED_PARTY_ROLE_ID = PD.PARTY_ROLE_ID)
  left outer join AUTHORISATION AIA
    on (    AIA.PROD_GRP_ID = 10004
        and AIA.PARTY_ROLE_ID = case
                                  when PD.REGULATION_TYPE_ID = 'rt_apprep' then
                                    PRN.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                else
                                  PD.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                end)
  left outer join AUTHORISATION AMA
    on (    AMA.PROD_GRP_ID = 10003
        and AMA.PARTY_ROLE_ID = case
                                  when PD.REGULATION_TYPE_ID = 'rt_apprep' then
                                    PRN.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                else
                                  PD.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                end)
  left outer join AUTHORISATION APA
    on (    APA.PROD_GRP_ID = 10002
        and APA.PARTY_ROLE_ID = case
                                  when PD.REGULATION_TYPE_ID = 'rt_apprep' then
                                    PRN.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                else
                                  PD.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                                end)
  left outer join ROLE_PERMISSION RP
    on (RP.PARTY_ROLE_ID = case
                             when PD.REGULATION_TYPE_ID = 'rt_apprep' then
                               PRN.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                           else
                             PD.PARTY_ROLE_ID
                           end)
  left outer join HO_PHONE HP
    on (HP.PARTY_ROLE_ID = HO.HEAD_OFFICE_PARTY_ROLE_ID)
  left outer join HO_EMAIL HE
    on (HE.PARTY_ROLE_ID = HO.HEAD_OFFICE_PARTY_ROLE_ID)

activities.name: cp-DPDB_ADVISER_FIRM_STG_Upsert
activities.description: Add any delta changes to the target

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TDAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
       TDAFS.ORGANISATION_NAME,
       TDAFS.FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
       TDAFS.STATUS,
       TDAFS.REGULATORY_STATUS_ID,
       TDAFS.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
       TDAFS.PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE,
       TDAFS.PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE,
       TDAFS.PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE,
       TDAFS.PERM_PENSION_ADVICE,
       TDAFS.ADDRESS_LINE_1,
       TDAFS.ADDRESS_LINE_2,
       TDAFS.ADDRESS_LINE_3,
       TDAFS.ADDRESS_LINE_4,
       TDAFS.POSTCODE,
       TDAFS.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
       TDAFS.PHONE_FAX_NUMBER,
       TDAFS.RECORD_UPDATE_IND,
       0 as RECORD_DELETE_IND,
       cast(sysdatetimeoffset() at time zone 'GMT Standard Time' as datetime) as UPDATE_DATE_TIME
  from (select PARTY_ROLE_ID,
               ORGANISATION_NAME,
               FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
               STATUS,
               REGULATORY_STATUS_ID,
               PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
               PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE,
               PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE,
               PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE,
               PERM_PENSION_ADVICE,
               ADDRESS_LINE_1,
               ADDRESS_LINE_2,
               ADDRESS_LINE_3,
               ADDRESS_LINE_4,
               POSTCODE,
               EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
               PHONE_FAX_NUMBER,
               convert(nvarchar(32), HashBytes('SHA2_256', concat(PARTY_ROLE_ID,
                                                                  ORGANISATION_NAME,
                                                                  FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
                                                                  STATUS,
                                                                  REGULATORY_STATUS_ID,
                                                                  PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
                                                                  PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE,
                                                                  PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE,
                                                                  PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE,
                                                                  PERM_PENSION_ADVICE,
                                                                  ADDRESS_LINE_1,
                                                                  ADDRESS_LINE_2,
                                                                  ADDRESS_LINE_3,
                                                                  ADDRESS_LINE_4,
                                                                  POSTCODE,
                                                                  EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
                                                                  PHONE_FAX_NUMBER)), 2) as RECORD_UPDATE_IND
          from STAGE_LOAD.TD_DPDB_ADVISER_FIRM_STG 
       ) TDAFS
  left outer join STAGE_CDI.DPDB_ADVISER_FIRM_STG DAFS
    on (    TDAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID = DAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID
        and TDAFS.RECORD_UPDATE_IND = DAFS.RECORD_UPDATE_IND)
 where DAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID is null

activities.name: cp-DPDB_ADVISER_FIRM_STG_Del
activities.description: Logically mark records no longer available in the source

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select DAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
       1 as RECORD_DELETE_IND,
       cast(sysdatetimeoffset() at time zone 'GMT Standard Time' as datetime) as UPDATE_DATE_TIME
  from STAGE_CDI.DPDB_ADVISER_FIRM_STG DAFS
  left outer join STAGE_LOAD.TD_DPDB_ADVISER_FIRM_STG TDAFS
    on (TDAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID = DAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID)
 where TDAFS.PARTY_ROLE_ID is NULL
